feed.title: MetaFilter Deleted Posts
feed.subtitle: Posts. That have been deleted. From MetaFilter.

entry.title: “Death Is What Gives Life Meaning”
entry.content:
Post 206440 deleted:
This post was deleted for the following reason: Sorry, but this conflicts with some criteria for Best Practices and Recommendations for Reporting on Suicide, which we try to abide by. No problem to do an edit and re-up for this. -- taz
entry.summary: Post 206440 deleted: This post was deleted for the following reason: Sorry, but this conflicts with some criteria for Best Practices and Recommendations for Reporting on Suicide, which we try to abide by. No problem to do an edit and re-up for this. -- taz

entry.title: Play Money
entry.content:
Post 206424 deleted:
This post was deleted for the following reason: Zalgo text is fun, but it's messing with the readibility on desktop, mobile, screen readers. OP, let us know if you want us to edit this post and republish it or if you want to make a new one -- Brandon Blatcher
